hibernate-mapping.query: select new loansdto ( l.SAmount, l.ExpireDate ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.AType = 'OVERDRAFT' and l.Active = true
select new loansdto ( l.SAmount, l.ExpireDate ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.AType = 'LOANS' and l.Active = true
select new loansdto ( l.SAmount, l.ExpireDate ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true
select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and l.LegalCase = true
select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and l.NPLCase = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' )
select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and convert(char(10),l.ExpireDate,111) < convert(char(10),:todaydate,111)

select new loansdto ( Sum(l.SAmount) ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and convert(char(10),l.ExpireDate,111) > convert(char(10),:todaydate,111) and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' )
select new loansdto ( l.LegalCase, l.Lno, l.AType, l.NPLCase ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and (l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate = '')

select new loansdto( l.Lno, l.AccountNo, l.AType, l.BType, l.SDate, l.SAmount, l.Time, l.Loans_Type, l.RelatedGLACode, l.ExpireDate, l.IntRate, l.UnUsedRate, l.FirstSAmount, l.DocmentationFee, l.LasIntDate, l.LasRepayNo, l.Min_Period, l.Vouchered, l.ACSign, l.UserNo, l.Assessor, l.Lawer, l.LegalCase, l.LegalDate, l.LegaLawer, l.CloseDate, l.NPLCase, l.NPLDate, l.LastUserNo, l.LastDate, l.Partial, l.VoucherDate, l.PartialNo, l.Scharges, l.TodSerial, l.TodCloseDate, l.Charges_Status, l.MarkNPLUser, l.NPLReleaseUser, l.MarkLegalUser, l.LegalReleaseUser, l.UniqueId, l.SourceBranchCode, l.Currency, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.BalStatus, l.UsedOverRate, l.isLateFee, l.GracePeriod, l.PrincipleRepayOptions, l.InterestRepayOptions ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Active = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' ) and l.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode

select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo, l.Lno, l.LegalCase, l.LasIntDate, l.NPLCase, l.Currency ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.SourceBranchCode =: sourceBr and l.Active = true and (l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate = '')
update TLMORM00018 l set l.LasIntDate = :lastIntDate, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :lno and l.Active = true
select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo , l.Lno , pg.AccountNo ) from TLMORM00018 as l , PFMORM00039 as pg where pg.LineNo = l.Lno and pg.AccountNo = :acctno and pg.Active = true
select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo , l.Lno , l.SAmount ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :acctno and l.Active = true

select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo, l.Lno, l.LegalCase, l.LasIntDate, l.NPLCase, l.Currency ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.CloseDate is null and l.Active = true and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and convert(char(10),l.ExpireDate,111) between convert(char(10),:sysdate,111) and convert(char(10),:today,111)

select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo, l.Lno, l.LegalCase, l.LasIntDate, l.NPLCase, l.Currency ) from TLMORM00018 as l where (l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate = '') and l.Active = true and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and convert(char(10),l.ExpireDate,111) < convert(char(10),:sysdate,111)

select new loansdto ( l.IntRate ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' ) and (l.AType = :acType1 or l.AType = :acType2) order by SDate desc

select new loansdto( l.Lno, l.AccountNo, l.AType, l.BType, l.SDate, l.SAmount, l.Time, l.Loans_Type, l.RelatedGLACode, l.ExpireDate, l.IntRate, l.UnUsedRate, l.FirstSAmount, l.DocmentationFee, l.LasIntDate, l.LasRepayNo, l.Min_Period, l.Vouchered, l.ACSign, l.UserNo, l.Assessor, l.Lawer, l.LegalCase, l.LegalDate, l.LegaLawer, l.CloseDate, l.NPLCase, l.NPLDate, l.LastUserNo, l.LastDate, l.Partial, l.VoucherDate, l.PartialNo, l.Scharges, l.TodSerial, l.TodCloseDate, l.Charges_Status, l.MarkNPLUser, l.NPLReleaseUser, l.MarkLegalUser, l.LegalReleaseUser, l.UniqueId, l.SourceBranchCode, l.Currency, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.BalStatus, l.UsedOverRate, l.isSCharge, l.isLateFee, l.GracePeriod, l.PrincipleRepayOptions, l.InterestRepayOptions ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Lno = :loanNo
and l.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr and l.ReversalStatus = 0 and l.Active = true

select new loansdto( l.Lno, l.AccountNo, l.AType, l.BType, l.SDate, l.SAmount, l.Time, l.Loans_Type, l.RelatedGLACode, l.ExpireDate, l.IntRate, l.UnUsedRate, l.FirstSAmount, l.DocmentationFee, l.LasIntDate, l.LasRepayNo, l.Min_Period, l.Vouchered, l.ACSign, l.UserNo, l.Assessor, l.Lawer, l.LegalCase, l.LegalDate, l.LegaLawer, l.CloseDate, l.NPLCase, l.NPLDate, l.LastUserNo, l.LastDate, l.Partial, l.VoucherDate, l.PartialNo, l.Scharges, l.TodSerial, l.TodCloseDate, l.Charges_Status, l.MarkNPLUser, l.NPLReleaseUser, l.MarkLegalUser, l.LegalReleaseUser, l.UniqueId, l.SourceBranchCode, l.Currency, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.BalStatus, l.UsedOverRate, l.isSCharge, l.isLateFee, l.GracePeriod, l.PrincipleRepayOptions, l.InterestRepayOptions ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Lno =: loanNo and l.Active = true
update TLMORM00018 l set l.Charges_Status = :chargesStatus, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.SAmount = :newODLimit, l.FirstSAmount = :newODLimit, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode and l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true

select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo, l.Lno, l.LegalCase, l.LasIntDate, l.NPLCase, l.Currency ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.Active = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' )

update TLMORM00018 l set l.NPLCase = :nplCase, l.MarkNPLUser = :userName, l.NPLDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.Assessor = :assessor, l.Lawer =:lawer, l.BType =:btype, l.ExpireDate =:edate, l.IntRate = :rate, l.UnUsedRate =:unUsedRate, l.UsedOverRate =:useOverRate, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, l.ReversalStatus = :reversalStatus where l.Lno = :lno and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.Vouchered = :vouchered, l.VoucherDate =:vDate, l.SAmount = l.SAmount + :samt, l.Partial =:partial, l.PartialNo = PartialNo + 1, l.Scharges=:serviceCharges, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :lno and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and l.Active = true
update TLMORM00018 l set l.LegaLawer = :legalawyer, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :lno and l.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr and l.Active = true

select new loansdto ( l.IntRate ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' ) and l.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr and (l.AType = :atype)

select new loansdto( l.Lno, l.AccountNo, l.AType, l.BType, l.SDate, l.SAmount, l.Time, l.Loans_Type, l.RelatedGLACode, l.ExpireDate, l.IntRate, l.UnUsedRate, l.FirstSAmount, l.DocmentationFee, l.LasIntDate, l.LasRepayNo, l.Min_Period, l.Vouchered, l.ACSign, l.UserNo, l.Assessor, l.Lawer, l.LegalCase, l.LegalDate, l.LegaLawer, l.CloseDate, l.NPLCase, l.NPLDate, l.LastUserNo, l.LastDate, l.Partial, l.VoucherDate, l.PartialNo, l.Scharges, l.TodSerial, l.TodCloseDate, l.Charges_Status, l.MarkNPLUser, l.NPLReleaseUser, l.MarkLegalUser, l.LegalReleaseUser, l.UniqueId, l.SourceBranchCode, l.Currency, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.BalStatus, l.UsedOverRate, l.isLateFee, l.GracePeriod, l.PrincipleRepayOptions, l.InterestRepayOptions ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.AccountNo =: accountNo and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' ) and l.AType != 'LOANS' and l.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.LegalCase = true, l.LegalDate = :legalDate, l.NPLCase = false, l.NPLDate = null, l.LegaLawer = :legalCaseLawyer, l.MarkLegalUser = :markLegalUser, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :lno and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.CloseDate = null, l.LegalCase = false, l.LegalDate = null, l.LegaLawer = null, l.LegalReleaseUser = :LegalReleaseUser, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :lno and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and l.Active = true

select new lidto( l.Id, l.LNo, l.Acctno, l.IntRate, l.Duration, l.Repaymentoption, l.M1, l.M2, l.M3, l.M4, l.M5, l.M6, l.M7, l.M8, l.M9, l.M10, l.M11, l.M12, l.Q1, l.Q2, l.Q3, l.Q4, l.QBal1, l.QBal2, l.QBal3, l.QBal4, l.UserNo, l.ACSign, l.CloseDate, l.Budget, l.UId, l.SourceBr, l.Cur, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedUserId, l.CreatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, loans.SAmount, loans.SDate ) from TLMORM00018 as loans inner join loans.Li as l with l.Active = true where l.Budget = :year and (l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate = '') and loans.Vouchered = true

select new loansdto( l.Lno, l.AccountNo, l.AType, l.BType, l.SDate, l.SAmount, l.Time, l.Loans_Type, l.RelatedGLACode, l.ExpireDate, l.IntRate, l.UnUsedRate, l.FirstSAmount, l.DocmentationFee, l.LasIntDate, l.LasRepayNo, l.Min_Period, l.Vouchered, l.ACSign, l.UserNo, l.Assessor, l.Lawer, l.LegalCase, l.LegalDate, l.LegaLawer, l.CloseDate, l.NPLCase, l.NPLDate, l.LastUserNo, l.LastDate, l.Partial, l.VoucherDate, l.PartialNo, l.Scharges, l.TodSerial, l.TodCloseDate, l.Charges_Status, l.MarkNPLUser, l.NPLReleaseUser, l.MarkLegalUser, l.LegalReleaseUser, l.UniqueId, l.SourceBranchCode, l.Currency, l.GracePeriod, l.PrincipleRepayOptions, l.InterestRepayOptions, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedDate, l.CreatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Active = true and l.Lno =:loanNo and l.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr

update TLMORM00018 l set l.SAmount = l.SAmount-:newODLimit, l.LasRepayNo=:repayNo, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode and l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true

update TLMORM00018 l set l.SAmount = l.SAmount+:newODLimit, l.LasRepayNo=:repayNo, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where l.Lno = :loanNo and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode and l.AccountNo = :accountNo and l.Active = true

select new loansdto ( l.AccountNo, l.Lno, l.LegalCase, l.LasIntDate, l.NPLCase, l.Currency ) from TLMORM00018 as l where l.Active = true and ( l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate='' ) and l.VoucherDate is not null and l.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr
